title: Home Internet - Intermittent Drops
description: A customer reports their internet connection drops for a few minutes several times a day.

tasks.description: Run a remote line history check for the past 72 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: The line history tool shows multiple modem retraining events each day.

tasks.description: Analyze the line quality metrics from the history, noting a poor Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies that the SNR is below the acceptable threshold.

tasks.description: Based on the poor line quality, schedule a technician to investigate for physical line faults.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a trouble ticket and schedules a technician visit.
